altername_name: Zennou Series Vol. 01: Akiyama Jin Kyouju Kanshuu: Zennou JinJin
name: Master Jin Jin's IQ Challenge
overview: (Currently available in the UK/EU only) This game is designed to be truly enjoyable, while at the same time aiming to stimulate and develop the brain. Stretch your mind with 10 different challenge types in five categories, each with multiple levels of difficulty. Over 300 Fun Intelligence Teasers Categories include: Reasoning, Observation, Intuition, Analysis, and Tenacity
